meanings.definition: A place or institution that is against traditional universities.
meanings.sent1: The antiuniversities offer a different approach to learning.
meanings.sent2: She decided to attend one of the antiuniversities to explore new ideas.
meanings.sent3: The antiuniversities hosted a debate on the future of education.
meanings.sent4: In a world of conformity, antiuniversities stand out like rebellious stars.
meanings.sent5: Visiting the antiuniversities felt like stepping into a realm of academic rebellion.

meanings.definition: The concept or movement of creating alternative educational spaces outside of traditional universities.
meanings.sent1: Students are drawn to the idea of antiuniversities for their innovative approach.
meanings.sent2: The antiuniversities movement aims to challenge the norms of higher education.
meanings.sent3: At the antiuniversities, learning feels like an adventure.
meanings.sent4: Joining the antiuniversities movement is like embarking on a journey of educational exploration.
meanings.sent5: The spirit of antiuniversities is a beacon of change in the educational landscape.
